CREATE TABLE vehicle_maintenance_schedule (
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    mechanic_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
    maintenance_id INT,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    mechanic_id INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Vehicle (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    maintenance_status BOOLEAN
);


CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    mechanic VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id)
);


CREATE TABLE MaintenanceHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    completion_date DATE,
    parts_replaced VARCHAR(100),
    labor_hours FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceSchedule(schedule_id)
);


CREATE TABLE MaintenanceStaff (
    staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    staff_name VARCHAR(50),
    specialty VARCHAR(50)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
